channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Green filter light has popped out and is now facing to the side, 14th May
item.description:
Green filter light on the left hand side has popped out and is facing to the right so is invisible to the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sofa, fridge and other items dumped, 13th May
item.description:
Various items dumped on footpath

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Thornbury Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several Cracks and multiple potholes on crossover, 12th May
item.description:
Several Cracks and multiple potholes on crossover of Bouncers Lane and Murco Bouncers Lane Service Station

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 55 Bouncer's Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken service access points, 12th May
item.description:
There are 2 sunken service access points at the Old Bath Road exit to the roundabout. These could easily unseat an unwary cyclist or motorcyclist as they are deep.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Old Bath Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen traffic post, 12th May
item.description:
This post has been knocked down. Please reinstate it as soon as possible before cars start to use the pedestrian area as a cut through as the post is the only thing stopping traffic. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Brada Cottage Lower Mill Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal parking on bend and opposite junction., 11th May
item.description:
These vehicles have allocated off road parking but choose to block the road. This has already caused a serious accident. This has been happening for a number of years.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Palm Court Sapphire Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Old carpet dumped outside 49 Clyde Cresent, Cheltenham., 11th May
item.description:
Been there over 2 weeks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 55 Clyde Crescent, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped mattress New Rutland Court, 11th May
item.description:
Mattress flytipped on the pavement at the entrance to New Rutland Court from Swindon Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 43 Swindon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole on entering shearwater grove 1 large circle one and a longer 1 by the kerb, 11th May
item.description:
Been here for a few weeks heavy rain made it worse

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 68 Shearwater Grove, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged street light, 11th May
item.description:
The street light on the right just inside Willersey Road from the Junction of Robert Burn's Avenue, Benhall, Cheltenham has it's electrical wiring exposed. The cover is on the ground at the bottom of post. It is very dangerous and can be reached by children.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Willersey Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several Pot Holes, 11th May
item.description:
Entire Gretton Road is quite frankly horrendous. Multiple patch repair jobs complete but dangerous and damaging to drive down. Car in for MOT today and failed for a cracked alloy, incredibly frustrating. Several cars drive down the road straddling the two lanes to avoid holes which is dangerous. Please repair entire road properly
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Ashmead House Malleson Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole by The Green carpark entrance., 11th May
item.description:
A new pothole has appeared by the entrance to The Green carpark.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 31 Bishops Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep pothole, 11th May
item.description:
Very deep (deeper than 10cm) and dangerous pothole. Impossible to avoid when there’s oncoming traffic as road is narrow resulting in damage to vehicles for residents and through traffic. Needs fixing urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 22 Westfield Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 10th May
item.description:
There’s a pothole on Hucclecote Road between the junction of N Upton Lane and Insley Gardens which is hazardous to cyclists due to its position.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Insley Gardens, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Nitrous Oxide cartridges in the road, 10th May
item.description:
There’s a lot of nitrous oxide cartridges in the road on the roundabout by the Wheatstone Inn, Centre Seven.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Wheatstone Inn Barnwood Link Road, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep large pothole, 10th May
item.description:
More than a month

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous highway, 10th May
item.description:
This section of the road is unbelievably damaged. The highway has failed and your inability to actually repair it properly is frustrating. It’s dangerous. From crickley hill park is the same
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Greenway Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black paths blocking path and split, 10th May
item.description:
Black bin bags blocking the path outside 3 Granville Street, wheelchairs and prams would not get by. Have been there since 30th April, now split with rubbish making its way down the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Granville Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of potholes, 10th May
item.description:
There are lots of potholes on the West bound carriageway, spread over quite a distance, hard to avoid all of them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Many large potholes, 9th May
item.description:
Potholes can cover the majority of both lanes, have been getting considerably worse recently. Be wary of cars weaving into oncoming traffic trying to avoid them from about 1/4 of a mile before Pilgrove Way to Pilgrove Way when traveling towards Tewkesbury Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Old Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
